Summary: Could not ask for a better location . The best of both worlds Bayview and beach surround you. Property is kept pristine and lots of helpful communication from Pam the Property manager . She goes above and beyond to ensure all the guests are comfortable and have everything they need.

Summary Heading: Can't rate the facility but can rate the people.
Summary: With less than two weeks before our occupancy date we had a family medical emergency that forced us to cancel our reservation. Pam was very open and honest with us that we were outside any possible refund deadlines. We understood and accepted our loss. Out of the blue Pam reached out to us to tell us she had found a tenant for our weekend and would coordinate a refund when they were paid.   I can't rate the facility but I can rate Pam and the management team with 5 Stars for honesty and integrity.  Joe K , Canyon Lake Ca.

My family and I recently stayed at Casa de Balboa 225, it was not our first visit to the area.  The location was perfect, weather was absolutely perfect and place was very clean.  I booked about 5 months ago as I was sold on the pictures on the advertisement.  When I arrived, I noticed that the living room was not decorated at all like the pictures posted. The chairs were not comfortable and could use better cushion/support.  The wall where the tv stand is located had no decore what so ever and was not warm or inviting as I would have liked.  Overall the kitchen, bathrooms and  bedroom were up to par.  The living room definitely needs some larger pieces of furniture to fill the large space including decore subtitle for such a beautiful location in my opinion.

This is the best location and space available in Newport Beach.  We first visited 12 years ago and just went back ( finally after being vaccinated) for the 5th time.  It never disappoints us, always with pristine conditions and designer updates.  The owner Pam is efficient and available should a problem arise.  We stayed in the new 219B unit and loved it!  It features three bedrooms', a garage, and AC.  The Viking stove might be a little over the top for a vacation stay but shows the level of care that goes into the decor.  Do not hesitate to select Casa de Balboa, and you like us will return many times.

The experience was terrific. The house was spacious and spotless. The communication with Pam was reliable. She responded immediately to questions. The location was remarkable because it was close to everything. It  is across from the harbor and a street away from the beach. Fish were constantly jumping out of the port, and most fun was watching all the boats, ships, and yachts as well as parties happening on the electric boats. Great experience and highly recommended. We are a family of 7, and everyone was comfortable—rented unit 229.

I could not have been any more pleased with Casa de Balboa! I've stayed at a LOT of beach rentals that I've found on VRBO and Airbnb and through other local rental companies, and NONE of them have been even close to as nice as Casa de Balboa. So many beach rentals are run-down or not taken care of, or have furniture that's falling apart or old, or just not clean. Casa de Balboa was SPOTLESS and beautifully decorated. The management company couldn't have been any nicer and more thorough with local guides/information, and property details. They also let us know about construction that was taking place nextdoor, which honestly wasn't an issue at all, and they even gave us a discounted price because of the construction. The location is perfect. Everything about this experience was

I can't wait to go back in March. Love love staying here. The views are so beautiful and the Casa's are all decorated in the most stylish way. Walk to the ocean or walk across the street to the bay beach. Doesn't get any better. Walk to many restaurants also!
Room tip: Top floor has the best views, but the bottom is great too!

Summary: Just finishing up a two week stay in Casa 227. We could not have been more pleased with our stay. We have stayed at rental properties before and so often, they don't exactly match up with the pictures you see on the web site. In this case, this place far exceeded our expectations. The location is ideal and the view from the unit is breathtaking. My wife and I love to walk and the Balboa Peninsula is a walkers paradise. We parked our car in the provided garage and hardly drove our car at all...almost everything is within walking distance. The unit itself is beautifully decorated and meticulously maintained. Everything is provided from the gas heater on the patio, cable TV in the living room and bedroom, and a clean barbeque for those nights that you'd rather eat in rather than

Walk to local restaurants, beach...fantastic harbor view. Dog friendly (thank you, Pam!). Beautifully decorated, very comfy. Very well equipped! We were pleasantly surprised by how lovely this condo is! We’ll be back!

Summary Heading: Our first week but third visit!
Summary: We had stayed at the Casa de Balboa properties before, but for shorter stays and never had time to experience how close we were to the ocean and the boardwalk which we enjoyed with our new Pedego bikes from 20th Street Beach and Bikes.  We truly felt as if we were in one of my model homes and enjoy all the attention to detail that makes each Casa unique.  I had a lot of "favorites" but the top three were: 1)  there is actually music channels on the TV selections 2) You can see the lighthouse(s) at night from 223 3) so close to the ocean and unfortunately Seaside Bakery also! There is a garage for your car and an outside patio. Walk across to the bayside beach and down the street to the lighthouse cafe for a meal with a view.  Really can't beat the location and we will be back
Room tip: You cannot miss, but the 3 bedroom units have magnificent  views.

Summary: This villa was home away from home, very clean, beds was very comfortable, kitchen was loaded with everything we needed plus it's pet friendly. The view of the bay was beautiful, the beach was just 2 minutes walk. we loved everything about this place, we will be back that's for sure. Thank you Pam our family really enjoyed it

This beautiful unit was directly across from a wonderful bayside beach, and features wonderful bay views, has a fabulous, large balcony, and Garage parking.   There are two dedicated bedrooms plus a third "tv" room with two daybeds which can sleep extra guests or family members. The owner is very friendly and helpful and provide many extras for the guest's convenience. I loved my stay here and felt very comfortable and safe.  The decorating and amenities are all first class!

Perfect location!  Close enough to the beach and pier without being bombarded by bikes and passerbys.  Loved watching the activity on the harbor and adjacent beach from our 2nd floor deck.  Did not cook, but kitchen is adequately stocked.  Nice linens and towels, comfortable beds.  Parking can be issue if your car is larger than a tic-tac, but managed to get our large SUV in the garage (but I'm sure that's an issue anywhere on the peninsula).  FYI--parking violation for the yellow loading zone across the street is $79 🙄.  Very short walk to all the action at restaurants, pier, and beach.  7-11 around the corner for quick needs.  Rentals for kayak, paddle boards, bikes etc also around the corner.  They deliver items right to you in front of the rental.  Cute lighthouse themed

We took the family and dogs last summer and it was the best vacation EVER!! The kids are still talking about it and for teenagers that says a lot. We are hoping to make this our annual vacation place even when the kids move out. The property management were first class. We parked the car and didn't move it all week. We could walk to anywhere we wanted to go. We have been telling everyone what an awesome vacation we had there.

"I can not “thank you” enough for the wonderful Christmas my sister and I shared at Casa de Balboa.  The place was charming with all the added touches of the holidays.  It brought back some fond memories for me when I moved out to California in 1985 and lived in that area.  It was fun to see what changes have been made but also to see some familiar spots."  It felt like a quiet, cozy little home!

Summary Heading: AN ABSOLUTELY BEAUTIFUL CONDO IN A GREAT LOCATION!  2ND TIME WE RENTED!
Summary: This is our 2nd stay at Casa de Balboa.  Last time we stayed in the upstairs 3-bed unit.  This time we stayed at the downstairs 2-bed unit.  Pam has the finest accommodations in any Newport Beach condo we have ever rented.  The towels and bedding are first class hotel quality.  The kitchen is fully equipped with cooking tools to make any dinner you desire.  The condo is just beautiful and close to everything.  This location is just a block from the pier and there is a Farmer's Market every Sunday morning.  We walked to the market, did our shopping and carried our produce just a block back to the condo.  One garage space is provided.  Parking is very limited to non-existent on the street.  I do not recommend bringing a 2nd vehicle as you will have a lot of problems finding a
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. Again, our apologies for this happening during your stay. The neighbor you mention has been evicted and is now gone (it wasn't our property). We are located in a very safe, quiet, family area and this was an isolated incident. Due to any lingering concerns we have installed a "Yardlock", a device that is combination only, on the 6 foot gate on the side to the rear of the property.  It is hooded on the opposite side and can only be operated from the rear or combination from the front.  This property is completely walled and fenced in. There is NO alley in back (would be easier access for anyone with intent of entering) making this Casa one of the safest ground level properties in Newport Beach.  One would have to go through two gates with the second gate being the 6FT locked gate, a well lit courtyard, and scale the 6ft gate or wall to enter.  Not that one would need it (and obviously was not seen by you), but there is a portable air conditioner as well as plenty of fans in each unit.  There also was a bar for the sliding glass door that one can use.  As far as parking which is an issue at any beach, you forgot to mention that you get a one car garage with each rental. Also due to the new Marina Park at the end of the beach, parking is particularly plentiful here...much of it metered though (some free spots can be had).  What you were observing was this same neighbor "jockeying" his roommates and his car for the "free" spots and both are long gone. I will send you pictures of the "Yardlock".  It's a pretty neat secure device and a pic will be posted on our web site as well. Looking forward to your return visit!

Summary: Absolutely Fabulous Newport Beach rental.  Great Location. Balcony with a view from every room but one to die for.   Beautifully appointed and fully equipped.  Communications with the landlord was superb.  Will be telling all my friends about this rental when they are in the Newport Beach area and want to spoil themselves with a long weekend of relaxation and fun.

we love the villa.  it is spacious and comfortable, right on the shore.  location is unbeatable.  walking distance to many restaurants.  My daughter loved having breakfast on the patio.  grill was very convenient as well.

We love this property! We have returned many times over the years to Casa De Balboa. The property is in a nice location close to a dock, and steps from the beach. The views are stunning. Everything you need to feel like home is included. We highly recommend staying here any time of year in Newport. The stylish décor is icing on the cake!

We were staying in apartment 229, which is upstairs and has a spacious patio with a barbecue, three bedrooms and two bathrooms. The apartment has a full kitchen with everything we needed and a living room, we did not really need, because we spend most of the time outside or in the cosy third bedroom, which is more like another living room. The location of the building right next to Newport Bay is fantastic and it's just a few meters down the street to the beach and the ocean. Disneyland is only a 30 minutes drive away. We would definitly rent this apartment again, if around the area.

Treated our Mom to a weekend getaway at Casa de Balboa and she loved it! The views and accommodations were amazing, we will definitely be visiting again.  The location provided a relaxing atmosphere and made our stay very enjoyable. Comfort and style rolled into one, we would definitely recommend Casa de Balboa to anyone looking for a wonderful beachfront getaway!      - Crystal Medina

Summary Heading: We will rent this beachhouse again and again
Summary: I grew up in Southern Cal and always wanted to rent in Balboa since I was a teenager. My daughter and I flew here from Maryland and stayed in #231 (2bd 2 ba) and it was FABULOUS. Very peaceful yet a block from the roar of the waves which was perfect for our morning walks. We bought groceries at a great store just blocks away and then cooked in this great kitchen with granite everwhere and all the right cookware/tools etc. Extremely comfortable and upscale rental. From the first day we said we need to come back for next years vacation!

I came here with two girlfriends to celebrate my 40th birthday and we had a GREAT time! We rented #225, which had 3 bedrooms so we would all have our own space. I don't know that I would want a 2 bedroom one, they are on the lower floors and their deck is pretty open.... every time we went in or out, they had no privacy. I really liked how private our deck was.  The location was perfect for us. We enjoyed sitting on our deck and watching the action in the harbor.  We also walked two blocks to the Balboa boardwalk and walked the Peninsula, then took the ferry for $1 to Balboa Island to explore there. It was so much fun!   The sunrise was amazing to wake up to through the master bedroom sliding doors, which open up to the deck. The kitchen was well equipped, there was nothing
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!!  It is greatly appreciated!!  The TV was replaced along with the DVD player..sorry you had issues with it.  We do our best to stay on top of everything to make your visit the most special vacation experience you can possibly have but just like home ownership things go when you least expect it.  As far as the privacy factor from the lower 2 bedroom Casas.   They unequivocally are th most privates lower level units on Balboa.  The decks cover the courtyards and there are walls on the sides that give the ultimate privacy...you are not vacationing with people above or on the side!  We do, however, have fencing/walls that allow the views and with this the beach goers or boaters may pass by.  It is a much better than being on the boardwalk with sides and above open on much smaller width lots....but the 3 bedrooms on the second floor are most private due to the location of the second floor.  Thanks again for your review!!!

Summary: We stayed at 229, a beautifully appointed and centrally located rental.  The views were beautiful, both early morning and sunset, and boat watching was an added bonus.  Greg was quick to address any special requests or needs we had, including showing up within hours to replace a DVD player (we had a toddler with us!).  I highly recommend this unit, however, you need to be quick, I think it fills up fast!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review!!  It is greatly appreciated!!  The TV was replaced along with the DVD player..sorry you had issues with it.  We do our best to stay on top of everything to make your visit the most special vacation experience you can possibly have but just like home ownership things go when you least expect it.  As far as the privacy factor from the lower 2 bedroom Casas.   They unequivocally are th most privates lower level units on Balboa.  The decks cover the courtyards and there are walls on the sides that give the ultimate privacy...you are not vacationing with people above or on the side!  We do, however, have fencing/walls that allow the views and with this the beach goers or boaters may pass by.  It is a much better than being on the boardwalk with sides and above open on much smaller width lots....but the 3 bedrooms on the second floor are most private due to the location of the second floor.  Thanks again for your review!!!

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at Casa 227 for a week in November and it was truely amazing.  The photos of the place are nice, but it is even better in person.  The place is fully outfitted and so comfortable.  And the location could not be better.  Amazing view of the Bay from the patio and couch, and one block for the beach.  The staff was so accomodating, even stopping  by to fix a minor issue with the blinds.  I can't wait to come back!

We searched for weeks to find a So Cal beach rental.  Found Casa de Balboa and was impressed.  Greg met us one day to check it out and found him to be outstanding.  The Casa was beautifully furnished, well maintained and exceptionally clean.  We spend most our time on the deck overlooking the inside beach, without the crowds and noise of the ocean front homes.  It is a short walk to the pier and very good restaurants.  Kayaks, bikes and Segways are just around the corner.  It was a great week and sad to leave, but we'll be back...

We recently stayed in Casa 227 with our three daughters and had a wonderful week. The apartment is beautifully furnished and extremely well equipped with great attention to detail, including lots of stuff for the beach. It is a real home from home. The apartment is situated at the end of a lovely quiet street with great views of the sea. The beach, restaurants and shops are all within easy walking distance. Booking the apartment from England was very easy, Pam was extremely helpful and gave me lots of useful information about the area and things to do. Wonderful!

I consider it my second home!    I have been coming for at least 7 years and rent the downstairs for my kids and stay upstairs in 225.    Every year I go home and buy something I've seen in Pam's condos.  From day one the presentation of her condos are spectaular, not to mention Greg and Pam.   Every year I think I am going to try somewhere else but fall in love every time I walk in the door!

We liked Casa de Balboa so much, we are hoping to go back again. The owner responded to our initial inquiry very quickly, and gave us all sorts of information about dining, shopping and things to do in the area. We loved the location which was close to all of the action, but lovely and quiet. When we had an internet connection problem, the owner had a new router installed the next day! Can't say enough good things, especially on a cold, gray, wet day in the Midwest like today when all I can think about is when we can get back to sunny Newport Beach and Casa de Balboa.

We recently stayed for 2 weeks in Casa 229. I am usually disappointed with what I see when I first arrive at a holiday house, its never as good as the advertisement, however there was nothing to be dissapoint at Casa de Balboa. From the spectacular veiw to the superbly decorated villa, even the beautiful cutlery and crockery....we wanted for nothing. Beach chairs, umbrellas and beach toys were supplied for the beach in front so we didn't need to rough it for a minute. I loved the fact that hand soaps, salt, pepper, paper towel, laundry detergent etc etc (all the little things) were all there for us to use during our stay. The kids loved it just as much and keep saying "Mum when are we going back to the Holiday House". I wish there wasn't 22 hours worth of travel time between us

This is one of the best places we've ever stayed.  My wife is extremely picky and is already talking about coming back.  The units are beautifully finished, and very well maintained.  Safe location, with interesting events going on all around.  Other locations in Newport Beach simply cannot compare to what you get here.  We were a group of seven people from Iowa sharing two units.  This is a wonderful location, and can't be beat anywhere in Newport Beach.  I know, because I rented a bike and rode all of the side roads and back alleys in this entire area.  You should do this ride also.   Be sure to tour Lido Island as well.  Very interesting real estate if you have few million laying around.    Parking is at a premium in Newport Beach but this location has plenty of it.  Quiet

We stayed for three weeks in apartment 225 .A family of six enjoyed every bit of it the view overlooking the bay proximity to the beach and cleanliness of the apartment all added up to make our stay totally comfortable.The place is well maintained and fully equipped .I would not hesitate to select the place for any upcoming stay in the future.

My husband and I stayed here with our 3 girls and absolutely loved it.  We stayed in 227, a ground floor unit.  It had a large master with separate bathroom and another bedroom with 2 twin beds and a 2nd bathroom.  Full size washer and dryer.  Fully stocked kitchen.  The casa was decorated beautifully.  It was in immaculate condition.   We loved the gorgeous view from the patio.  We watched the boats in the bay.  The kids liked the sandy beach area by the bay. Just a short walk to the Newport pier and shops and restaurants.  Loved our stay!!

After searching the internet for more than an hour, looking for a "luxury hotel" in or near newport beach, I stumbled on the website for Casa de Balboa.  Intrigued, I called the owner, who confirmed the details.  We took Unit 231 for the weekend, and could not have been more delighted.  Lovely modern kitchen with granite countertop, beautifully polished hardwood floors, superb furniture, excellent linens and towls.  On top of all of this, the view overlooking the harbor and all of the moored and moving boats, the reviewer who said "WOW" had it exactly right.  The rate was more than agreeable for what we got.  A terrific find.  Four times better than any luxury hotel would have been.  Very friendly ownership.  A deal extraordinary.

We just returned from a stay at Casa De Balboa and just had a splendid time.  We spent an extended weekend in unit 231.  We really had an awesome time with views of the Bay and sailboats cruising by.  Casa De Balboa is in the heart of Newport Beach yet in the absolute luxury of this well stocked 2 bedroom  condo, you feel miles away from it all. The Pacific Ocean is 2 blocks away and the unit is directly across the street from Balboa Bay.  Pam and Greg did a spectacular job of decorating and providing all of the comforts of home here.  We had a BBQ and enjoyed the gas heater on the patio while we viewed the beach and harbor.  We will definitely return here on our next visit to Southern California.

We have just returned from our vacation to Newport Beach. What a fantastic experience we had at Casa de Balboa! It is perfectly located, spotlessly clean and has everything that you could possibly need while on vacation. Our vacation prior to this one was at a 5* at Atlantis/Bahamas.  While it was very nice, our stay at the Casa was so much more enjoyable. Our children take afternoon naps - but instead of being stuck in a dark hotel room for 2-3 hours, we were able to sit out on our patio, sip wine and enjoy the beach! I'm am telling you, if you are traveling with children there is simply no better place to stay. We loved being able to cook our own meals in the gourmet kitchen and then enjoy them on the patio, watching the boats go by.  Pam and Greg were an absolute delight to

WOW! We had such a great experience that we have already booked for next year!  From check in until checkout everything was just like Pam promised. The beach was a few feet away, the Casa was clean and really nicely decorated.  We were within walking distance to all the shops and restuarants.  My wife, who is in the hospitality industry and lets just say she is pretty hard to impress, was on the phone to all of our friends and relatives raving about how relaxing it was!  It is our new favorite vacation spot!  Kids loved it, dog loved it! Thanks again!!

My family and I stayed for better then a week last summer.  I can not say enough about this establishment.  The owners are super friendly, there is not a pool, but  the beach is right there, I mean I actually tossed my husband a towel from just outside our courtyard, thats how close you are to the beach.  We rode bikes or walked to the shops, resturaunts and even the market.  Everything you needed was right there. This is just around the corner from Bayshores Inn which is not beach front like Casa de Balboa which seems to be everyone's preference.  If you don't want to dine out, no problem, full kitchens and even a grill. This is a home away from home.  The views are terrific, the rooms were perfect.  Clean and every detail you could imagine was not left out.  We were on the bay

I have to say that I don't usually take the time to write reviews but felt this property definitely deserved my positive comments.  First of all, the location is quite supreme.  It's kind of an undiscovered niche.  I love it.! I live and work in Orange County and have seen it all (so I thought), yet I still found this little corner of the world to be such a surprise!  Loved it!  Loved the accommodations and the management is incredible.  I would most certainly recommend this to friends and will definitely be returning!!!!
